channel.title: Projects on Tony Kim | Blog & Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Tony Kim | Blog & Portfolio

item.title: A Medieval Grocery Store
item.description: Medieval Stall A medieval stall with some fruit boxes. The roof cloth is created via nCloth in Maya. The apples and pears in the boxes are created via MASH library.

item.title: Coke
item.description: Coke A plastic bottle of coke. Tools Modeling: Maya 2019 Rendering: Renderman 23.5

item.title: Gothic Cathedral
item.description: Gothic Cathedral Modular 3D gothic cathedral asset. How I made it is explained on my blog in Korean. How I made my modular 3D gothic cathedral Tools Modeling: 3ds Max 2022

item.title: Imaginary Dagger
item.description: Imaginery Dagger This is an imaginary dagger. I referred to a product presented below. Product Info: link Tools Modeling: Maya 2019 Texturing: Substance Painter 7.1.1 Rendering: Iray (Substance Painter builtin renderer)

item.title: Phong Reflection Model Simulator(PRMS)
item.description: Phong Reflection Model Simulator(PRMS) Phong Reflection Model Simulator is a simple 3D graphics simulator written in C++ and OpenGL. It is a brief program that simulates how phong reflection models work.

item.title: Viking Helmet
item.description: Viking Helmet This is viking helmet. The fur under the horns is created via XGen library. Tools Modeling: Maya 2019 Texturing: Substance Painter 7.1.1 Rendering: Iray (Substance Painter builtin renderer)
